General.Name: Fu Yu Property Co Ltd
General.Description: Fu Yu Property Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of real estate properties in Taiwan. It also constructs factories; and builds, leases, contracts, and sells houses. The company was formerly known as Spring Rain Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fu Yu Property Co., Ltd. in September 2013. Fu Yu Property Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 238, Shizheng North 2nd Road, Taichung, Taiwan
